attributes.action: Make all high profile sex offenders in the public eye repay their salaries
attributes.additional_details:
Make it law that any public servant who has received high salaries or rewards, as a result of being in a high profile job, I.e. television actor or presenter, M.P. newspaper employee etc. whilst committing sex acts against children, or other vulnerable persons. Should have their earnings, bonuses, or other perks, reviewed. And where appropriate have their salaries during the period of  offences, claimed back  and 50% paid back to the employer and 50% to their victims or a fund for victims.
And that all pensions from employers such as the government and the BBC they are receiving to be stopped immediately, and reviewed and reduced by removing benefits for the years they committed the offences
